docs.title: Observations
docs.text:
• Agents utilize old emails to copy an existing email structure, which is inefficient.
  • A better method would be to provide structured templates for consistency.
  • Notes often include short-form information based on agent preference. A structured template for filling out notes would improve efficiency.
  • Senior employees frequently guide juniors and new hires on the correct communication format.

docs.title: Proposals
docs.text: • Develop an extension that provides support for templates, accessible via shortcuts or a list selection.

docs.title: Tech PoV (1 week)
docs.text:
• Research and add 5-10 unified templates for communication.
  • Allow agents to create and use custom templates as needed.
  • Identify frequently used templates and create shortcuts.
  • Consider incorporating LLM solutions for dynamic template generation.

docs.title: Process
docs.text: • Shortcuts to be determined based on discussion and analysis of commonly used templates.

docs.title: Previous Process
docs.text:
• No standardized process existed.
  • Agents manually copied previous communications to maintain consistency.

docs.title: TemplateAgent Highlights
docs.text: • Implemented a unified communication method for efficiency and standardization.

docs.title: Future Applications
docs.text:
• Integrate LLM-based prompt-driven template suggestions for specific client communications.
  • Include graphical templates for professionally designed emails, similar to those sent by BMS company Handle.

docs.title: KPIs to Track
docs.text:
• NPS (Net Promoter Score) – Measure client satisfaction.
  • Agent Productivity – Assess efficiency improvements.
  • Service Usage – Track adoption and effectiveness of the provided templates.
